casebody.data:
Janet HENEBEMA, Plaintiff,
v.
Domenico RADDI, Jr., Defendant,
and
South Jersey Transportation Authority and New Jersey State Police, Defendants-Movants. M-811/812 September Term 2017
080492 Supreme Court of New Jersey. March 12, 2018

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motions for leave to file a motion for a stay as within time (M-811) and for a stay (M-812) are granted.
